Cerita Viral #LayanganPutus Menyayat Hati di Linimasa
03 Nov 2019, 17:32 by Fitraya Ramadhanny - detikInet


Foto: Thinkstock

Jakarta - Akhir pekan ini para netizen membagikan cerita viral #LayanganPutus. Kisahnya menyayat hati di linimasa. Apalagi ini didasari kisah nyata.Pertama kali beredar di Facebook, #LayanganPutus adalah cerita dua bagian tentang cerita sedih seorang istri dengan 4 orang anak. Suaminya menghilang tak ada kabar.Sang istri menduga suaminya yang religius dan punya akun populer di Youtube itu itu pergi ke Suriah, karena membawa paspor. Eh tak disangka, suaminya malah pergi ke Turki... dengan istri baru dan alasan menjaga hijrah si perempuan.Kisah mereka berakhir dengan perceraian. Di sinilah hati para netizen meledak. Tagar #LayanganPutus melesat di lini masa Twitter, Facebook dan Youtube. Tentunya netizen tidak lepas dari pergunjingan juga mulai mencari tahu siapa suaminya, apa akun Youtube dakwahnya, siapa sang istri yang menulis cerita ini dan siapa istri barunya yang merupakan selebgram.Sepanjang weekend dalam pantauan detikcom, masyarakat mencoba mencari tautan cerita viral ini yang sudah dihapus oleh penulisnya, namun sudah beredar di media sosial. Banyak yang ketinggalan informasi.



Mereka yang sudah membaca, bersimpati kepada si penulis. Mereka memberikan banyak pesan semangat.



Netizen lain pun menjadikan cerita ini sebagai pembelajaran hidup dan lebih berhati-hati dalam membina rumah tangga. Meski tidak sedikit juga yang menyindir pelakunya.

Viral Stories #LayanganPutus Makes it Heart on the Timeline
03 Nov 2019, 17:32 by Fitraya Ramadhanny - detikInet


Photo: Thinkstock

Jakarta - This weekend netizens share the #LayanganPutus viral story. The story is heartbreaking on the timeline. Moreover, this is based on a true story. First circulating on Facebook, #LayanganPutus is a two-part story about the sad story of a wife with 4 children. Her husband disappeared. There was no news. The wife suspected that her husband, who was religious and had a popular account on YouTube, had gone to Syria, because he was carrying a passport. Uh unexpectedly, her husband instead went to Turkey ... with a new wife and a reason to keep the woman's migration. Their stories ended in divorce. This is where the hearts of netizens exploded. The hashtag #LayanganPutus is racing in Twitter, Facebook and Youtube timelines. Of course netizens can not be separated from the gossip also began to find out who her husband is, what is his preaching Youtube account, who is the wife who wrote this story and who is his new wife who is a celebrity. the writer, but has been circulating on social media. Many miss information.



Those who have read, sympathize with the author. They give many encouraging messages.



Other netizens also made this story a life lesson and were more careful in fostering the household. Although not a few also teasing the culprit.
